    • Method Detail

      • mapIndex

        String mapIndex(List<DataProperty> inputDataProperties,
              IDataHolder dataHolder)
        Map scalar value to a json encoded, but not quoted field.
        Parameters:
        inputDataProperties -
        dataHolder -
        Returns:
        Object A JSONAware object (from org.json.simple) or an Object that can be interpreted as a valid JSON value, e.g. String, Integer, Double etc. Arbitrary objects will be converted to a String via their toString() method. Null return implies there is no data and the mapped field should be omitted from the document. Mappings for required fields cannot return null.

      • mapQuery

        String mapQuery(List<DataProperty> queryDataProperties,
              IDataHolder dataHolder)
        Map query value to json encoded, but not quoted field.
        Parameters:
        queryDataProperties -
        dataHolder -
        Returns:
        T the data or data range for this query field, or null if no query against this field is required. Data should not be quoted or encoded. This will be handled by the caller according to the encoder registered for this query term.

      • mapSortColumn

        String mapSortColumn(List<ResultField> resultFields,
                   List<DataProperty> criteriaProperties,
                   IDataHolder dataHolder)
        Map single property column name to a single solr field name.
        Parameters:
        resultFields -
        criteriaProperties -
        dataHolder -
        Returns:
        Name of solr field for sorting these results by or null if sorting this field is not supported

      • mapQueryResult

        Object mapQueryResult(List<ResultField> resultFields,
                    List<DataProperty> criteriaProperties,
                    IDataHolder dataHolder,
                    IResultHolder solrResult)
        Map a scalar result from solr into a single field for the result row instance
        Parameters:
        resultFields -
        criteriaProperties -
        dataHolder -
        solrResult -
        Returns:
        Object the value to map for this result field(s)
